name: Display: Link preview should display in center and reply RHS

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
Display
————————————————————————————
1. Go to Settings -> Display -> Default Appearance of Image Previews-> Edit
2. Select "Expanded"
3. Save
4. Post the link: http://www.mattermost.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/04/icon_WS.png
inline.expectedResult: ​​​​Link should show a preview of the Mattermost logo.

inline.description:
Display
————————————————————————————
1. Reply to above message (the post with the Mm logo) with this link:

https://github.com/mattermost/mattermost-server
inline.expectedResult: Both the posted Mm logo and the link preview in the reply should display in BOTH RHS and center
